subject: The World Bank Directorate
body:
The World Bank Directorate
Sector Director of the Social Protection & Labor Unit in the  Human Development Network
FOR YOUR KIND ATTENTION:  
This is to bring to your kind attention that the The World Bank Directorate of the Social Protection & Labor Unit in the  Human Development Network are fully aware of the transfer process going on between you and Mr. Richard K Davies of US BANK Plc. At board meeting of this office, the president of US (Joe Biden) and the IMF which ended few hours ago, it was concluded that all financial transactions will be monitored by this office as we have notice some unscrupulous and fraudulent activities with the so called paying banks,barristers, individuals and other offices instructed to fund transfer. So in that effect you are hereby advised to stop further communication with anybody,barrister or office concerning this your fund transfer as Mr. Richard K Davies of US BANK is the only one that has the right and power to remit your fund to you this time around.
Secondly, we are also aware that your fund worth $5 million  is ready and scheduled for transfer and you were asked to pay the total sum of   $799  only for the transfer fee to get this done.  At the meeting also we have instructed Mr. Richard K Davies to receive the sum of   $799  only from you as you have paid and suffered so much in the hands of impostors trying to get this done and you have just 48 hours to clear this bill of   $799  only to facilitate the immediate transfer of your fund as the US TREASURY DEPARTMENT needs to balance the 4th quarter of the years annual budget so do make this payment available to the bank within the given time to avoid losing your fund worth $5 million.
Thirdly, I also want you to know that this   $799  will be the last fee that will be demanded from you unless instructed otherwise by this office and the President.TAKE MY ADVICE NOW.
Finally you are advised to update us on any proceeding with Mr. Richard K Davies as we are here to protect you and your fund.
Regard
Robert Holzmann
Sector Director

subject: Re:   The World Bank Directorate
body:
Hello Robert Holzmann,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the transfer process between myself and Mr. Richard Davies of US BANK Plc. I appreciate your concern and the information you have provided.

I understand that there have been fraudulent activities surrounding fund transfers, and I'm glad to know that The World Bank is monitoring the situation. It's important to ensure the security of my funds.

You mentioned that Mr. Richard Davies is the only one with the authority to remit my funds to me at this time. Could you please clarify why this is the case? Is there a specific reason why he has been given exclusive control over the transfer?

Regarding the transfer fee, I want to make sure I understand correctly. Am I required to pay a total sum of only in order to facilitate the immediate transfer of my funds? Can you provide more details about how this fee will be used and what it covers?

I appreciate your assurance that this will be the last fee demanded from me, unless instructed otherwise by your office. It's good to know that there won't be any additional unexpected costs.

I will keep you updated on any further proceedings with Mr. Richard Davies as per your advice. Thank you for looking out for my best interests and protecting my funds.

Best wishes,
Doris
